metadataAttributes.Title: Exploring and Producing Data for Business Decision Making
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course provides an analytical framework to help you evaluate key problems in a structured fashion and will equip you with tools to better manage the uncertainties that pervade and complicate business processes. Specifically, you   will learn how to summarize data and learn concepts of frequency, normal distribution, statistical studies, sampling, and confidence intervals.
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Fataneh Taghaboni-Dutta, Ph.D., PMP, CSM, CSPO
